General.Name: Sichuan Changhong Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Changhong Electric Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells consumer electronics products in China and internationally. The company offers televisions, refrigerators, compressors, washing machines, sweeping robots, smart boxes, audio-visual products, batteries, and other products. It offers its products under the HUAYI, CHiQ, jiaxipera, Changhong, and oboni brand names. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Mianyang, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No.35, East Mianxing Road, Mianyang, China, 621000
